content: this pattern is suitable for those who have basic crochet skills pdf pattern includes 5 pages of step-by-step descriptions including 15 photos the pattern is written in standard us terms difficulty level easy beginner materials cotton or acrylic yarn i used yarnart jeans 160g/50m stuffing i used holofiber main hook i used number 2 two 6 mm black eyes that can be sewn or glued superglue optional black mouliné thread for embroidering the nose yarn needle scissors keychain base optional
